headline: Will Leadership Shuffle And Special Dividend Shift PACCAR's (PCAR) Capital Allocation Narrative?
summary: PACCAR Inc recently announced leadership changes effective January 1, 2026, promoting Kevin D. Baney to President and John N. Rich to Executive Vice President and Chief Technology Officer, while refining responsibilities across its truck, parts, technology, and support businesses. Alongside these management moves, PACCAR’s Board declared an extra US$1.40 per share special cash dividend and reaffirmed a regular US$0.33 quarterly dividend, underscoring its current approach to returning cash to...
